articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The recommended UK price will rise by up to 170%, although the impact on consumers could be more limited.
articles.title: Cost of weight loss drug Mounjaro may rise significantly

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The number of data centres is set to jump by a fifth in the coming years, figures seen by the BBC suggest.
articles.title: Data centres to be expanded across UK as concerns mount

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The show's production company says another chef decided not to be included "given recent events".
articles.title: MasterChef: Second contestant edited out of Gregg Wallace and John Torode's final series

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The girl was found unresponsive at a flat in Huddersfield and died in hospital, police say.
articles.title: Teenager arrested after death of 13-year-old girl in Huddersfield

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: An inquest jury finds 14-year-old Ruth Szymankiewicz was unlawfully killed.
articles.title: Girl who died after Maidenhead hospital failure unlawfully killed

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Donald Trump will host Vladimir Putin in Alaska - their first meeting in six years -as he tries to secure a Ukraine war ceasefire.
articles.title: Ukraine war: US and Russian delegations head to Alaska for crunch talks

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The percentage of boys' grades that were A* or A was 28.4%, narrowly beating the 28.2% achieved by girls.
articles.title: A-level results: Why did boys outperform girls for top grades?

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Two new potential drugs have been designed by AI to kill drug-resistant bacteria, in a major Massachusetts Institute of Technology study.
articles.title: AI designs new superbug-killing antibiotics for gonorrhoea and MRSA

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: No matter what happens between Trump and Putin, Ukrainians think Russia has no plan to stop the war.
articles.title: Left out of Alaska talks, Ukrainians fear an unjust peace

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Rebecca Young, 12, was recognised for designing a solar-powered backpack with an electric blanket inside.
articles.title: Pupil who invented device to help homeless named 'girl of the year'
